title: Noam Chomsky: Requiem for the American Dream with Amy Goodman (2017)
description:
Noam Chomsky talked about his book Requiem for the American Dream: The 10 Principles of Concentration of Wealth and Power, in which he takes a critical look at income inequality and concentrated wealth in the United States today. He was interviewed by Amy Goodman.
